txt.en: The Orc defiler has learned of plagues and venoms, and can put them to use restoring the forces of the dark lord or bring low the free people.

Orcs use the Black Speech -- a guttural and perverse corruption of an ancient Elvish mode -- to form their names. Some common initial elements are Ak-, Bag-, Grish-, Lug-, Muz-, Shak-, and Shap-.\n\nSome common final elements are -bash, -burz, -dush, -gash, -luk, -nakh, and -rat.
